Title: Biden: Ukraine will win this war
Description: U.S. President Joe Biden has expressed confidence that Ukraine will win the fight against Russian military aggression.

Title: Woman killed, man wounded in Nikopol as result of Russian shellin...
Description: During the day, on September 29, Russian troops struck Nikopol district with heavy artillery and drones, killing a woman and wounding a man.

Title: Russians drop ammunition from drone in Kherson - man wounded
Description: A man was wounded in Kherson as a result of a drone dropping ammunition.

Title: Enemy shells two villages in Kherson region - civilians wounded
Description: Two people were wounded as a result of Russian shelling of Bilozerka and Mykilske in the Kherson region.
